content:
What a great idea! A dance-themed party with a Zumba session sounds like an absolute blast! I'd be happy to help you create a fun and energetic playlist to get your guests moving and grooving!

Here are some playlist ideas to get you started:

**Warm-Up (5-10 minutes)**

* Upbeat pop and rock tracks to get the energy going:
	+ "Can't Stop the Feeling!" by Justin Timberlake
	+ "Happy" by Pharrell Williams
	+ "Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars
	+ "Walking on Sunshine" by Katrina & The Waves

**Zumba Segment (20-30 minutes)**

* High-energy Latin and international tracks to get the party started:
	+ "Despacito" by Luis Fonsi ft. Daddy Yankee
	+ "Mi Gente" by J Balvin & Willy William
	+ "Havana" by Camila Cabello ft. Young Thug
	+ "Vaina Loca" by Ozuna
	+ "Ay Vamos" by J Balvin

**Peak Energy (10-15 minutes)**

* Intense, fast-paced tracks to get the heart rate up:
	+ "Lean On" by Major Lazer & DJ Snake ft. MØ
	+ "Shut Up and Dance" by Walk the Moon
	+ "Cake by the Ocean" by DNCE
	+ "We Found Love" by Rihanna ft. Calvin Harris

**Cool-Down (5-10 minutes)**

* Fun, upbeat tracks to bring the energy back down:
	+ "I Gotta Feeling" by The Black Eyed Peas
	+ "Pumped Up Kicks" by Foster the People
	+ "All About That Bass" by Meghan Trainor
	+ "Shut Up and Let Me Go" by The Ting Tings

**Bonus Tracks (optional)**

* Add some extra fun with these dance-friendly tracks:
	+ "YMCA" by the Village People
	+ "Celebration" by Kool & The Gang
	+ "Dancing Queen" by ABBA
	+ "I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor

Remember to tailor the playlist to your party's theme, your guests' tastes, and the overall vibe you want to create. You can also consider including some popular Zumba tracks or remixes to keep the energy high and the party going!

Have fun planning your dance-themed party, and I hope your guests have an amazing time dancing the night away!
